text: On June 7, 2023, Doug Burgum, the 33rd governor of North Dakota, announced his candidacy for the 2024 United States presidential election. He is running for the Republican Party nomination in its 2024 presidential primaries. In March 2023, Burgum had shown interest in running for president. He announced his campaign at a rally in Fargo, North Dakota. After low polling numbers and failing to qualify in the third and fourth presidential debate, Burgum suspended his campaign on December 4, 2023. ==References== Burgum, Doug
title: Doug Burgum 2024 presidential campaign
